snippet.title: Lomustine
snippet.description: Lomustine Lomustine is FDA approved for the treatment of brain tumors, either those that have originated in the brain or have spread to the brain from a different site in the body, in patients who have already received appropriate surgery or radiation therapy. Lomustine, in combination with other agents, is also approved for the treatment of Hodgkinâ€™s disease that has recurred or has never responded to previous therapy
